name: Shapsu
description:
Overview

Shapsu is a game about making shapes happy by sliding them home.

Try the intro levels to get the idea, and then play infinite levels in several categories.

Play on Mobile and Tablets

Shapsu is playable on touch devices, including phones and tablets.  In fact, it works fine with multi-touch, so it can be played cooperatively on a touch device with several people at once.

Beat Par on Simple

Simple levels have a par score you can try to beat in order to earn a face reward.  Note: The par score is only a feature of Simple levels - more advanced levels are too tough for the game to solve on its own to find a minimum par score.

Unlock Faces

Beating par on simple levels or finishing any other level category unlocks a shape face you can play with in future levels.

If you earn a face you already have, it stacks up and eventually earns you a more rare face.

Local Storage (Stats, Faces)

Stats and unlocked faces are stored in local storage in your browser.  If you play in a new browser or on a new device, you'll have empty stats to start with.  Clearing your browser cache will also delete your stats and unlocked faces.  There's currently no way to move stats or faces from one device to another.
